short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows you to search, view, and save bulk animated GIFs. Provides save animated GIFs, MP4 format to Google Drive directly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app allows you to search, view, download, and save animated GIFs.
Provides save animated GIFs, MP4, Webm format to Google Drive directly.

You can download animated GIF as original, large, medium, small sized.
Supports search all GIFs, search trending GIFs.
